tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Amazing experience! - I visited Dr. Kiranjeet for pregnancy & delivery and had a really nice experience! Apart from being polite and friendly, she is extremely warm and makes it a point to answer all your queries. She encouraged and helped me have a normal delivery. I must say, visiting Dr. Kiranjeet was the best decision I could have made during my pregnancy and I would not think twice before recommending her to my family and friends.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited to Kiranjeet kaur ma'am for my wife pregnancy regular checkup in her Vandana diagnostic clininc at Geetanjali. On first visit she behaved well and also ask about medical insurance through which we are empanelled. 
On 2nd visit she again asked for medical insurance and after knowing all the details she told us that she will charge 10k extra from the maternity package because she does not get sufficient amount from empanelled medical insurance delivery packages. We were shocked and worried at that stage after loosing confidence on this doctor and later we changed the doctor. This happened in September 2021. I request to all, please don't visit **** ****** ******* *** ***** *** ***** **** *** **** *** ***** ***** ******* *******
reply_text:
Since you have not disclosed your identity while writing a negative review, we have recovered it from our data.
Firstly, you and your wife came to me in the eighth month of pregnancy after changing your doctor twice. On your first visit a thorough/ detailed consultation was done and a care plan was made. On the second visit you were clearly counselled regarding plan of treatment and the professional charges involved. There was no further discussion regarding your aforesaid apprehensions. Since there was no compulsion to avail my professional services, you decided to change the doctor again as you had done before and never came back for further consultation to be able to help you. You are free to choose your doctor but it is not right to portray the doctor in a negative way for your decision.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited her couple of weeks back. The doctor has zero empathy towards patients and their problems. Although we got charged for consultation but doc only focused on data entry into the system with zero guidance and took the print out thereafter and handed it over to us. Empathy training should be 101 for doctors in the professional consulting, thats what they are getting paid for.

review: When I met with mam i was wife is fully satisfied with her. she is like another MOTHER OF MY KID rest no word to say. Without you by my side, I would not be the successful mother that I am today. Miss u mam for my second one.

review: the way she handle my first pregnancy was appreciable. I like the way she treat her patient and my first pregnancy was completely normal under her supervision.
She is very nice doctor. It was good to be treated with professionalism and care. I was very pleased with my experience at doctor care.
